ESP.ORIGINAL:
ScriptName NVDLC05PulseSlugScript
; Inflicts EMP damage on impact ; JES 4.12.11 - Created ; J.S. 4/12/11 - Modified script to handle effects as if the target were the object where the script runs (that's how actor effects, and enchantment effects, get applied with custom effect scripts). ; J.S. 8/11/11 - Added call to cast the PulseDisableSpell right away - its own timer will take care of removing the shaders.
Begin ScriptEffectStart
If (GetIsCreatureType 6 == 1) CIOS PulseDisableSpell; DamageAV Health 50; Endif
If (GetEquipped RepairPowerArmor == 1 || GetEquipped RepairRemnantsPowerArmorList == 1) CIOS PulseDisableSpell; DamageAV Health 25; Endif
END

scn NVDLC05ChallengeMasterOfTheArsenalSCRIPT
BEGIN ScriptEffectStart
Player.RewardXP 500 AddAchievement 72
END

scn NVDLC05TwoStepGoodbyeEffectSCRIPT
Float Timer Short DoOnce Int Beeps
Begin ScriptEffectStart
playsound WPNMineTick
End
Begin ScriptEffectUpdate
If DoOnce == 0 If Timer > 2 placeatme NVDLC05TwoStepGoodbyeExplosion Set DoOnce to 1 Else Set Timer to Timer + GetSecondsPassed If Beeps == 2 && Timer > 1.5 playsound WPNMineTick set Beeps to 3 Return ElseIf Beeps == 1 && Timer > 1 playsound WPNMineTick set Beeps to 2 Return ElseIf Beeps == 0 && Timer > 0.5 playsound WPNMineTick set Beeps to 1 Return EndIf EndIf EndIf
End

scn NVDLC05ChallengeCuriosAndRelicsScript
Begin ScriptEffectStart
Player.RewardXP 500 AddAchievement 71;
End

Scn NVDLC05FlamerShaderEffectSCRIPT
; J.S. 6/15/11 - Simple script, tied to a MGEF, to apply a fire shader upon being hit by the spell/enchantment.
BEGIN ScriptEffectStart
If (IsGoreDisabled == 0) PlayMagicShaderVisuals Flames01; Endif
END
BEGIN ScriptEffectFinish
StopMagicShaderVisuals Flames01;
END

ScriptName NVDLC05DragonsBreathEffectScript
short DoOnce
Begin ScriptEffectStart
if IsSpellTarget NVDLC05DragonsBreathActorEffect== 0 cios NVDLC05DragonsBreathActorEffect endif
End
Begin ScriptEffectUpdate
if GetDead == 1 if IsSpellTarget NVDLC05DragonsBreathActorEffect == 0 cios NVDLC05DragonsBreathActorEffect endif endif
End

ESP.TRADUIT: 核子可乐破坏者模型效果
阿尔法高级微聚增殖器(GRA)
火焰喷射器燃料优化型
微型核融电池 优化

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see what you've got for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你这儿都卖什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Short nNumCaps Set nNumCaps to VendorContainerCliffBriscoeREF.GetItemCount caps001; If (nNumCaps > 5000) VendorContainerCliffBriscoeREF.RemoveItem caps001 nNumCaps; VendorContainerCliffBriscoeREF.AddItem caps001 5000; Endif
if (GetReputationThreshold RepNVNovac 1 >= 5) ShowBarterMenu 30 elseif (GetReputationThreshold RepNVNovac 2 >= 5) ShowBarterMenu 35 elseif (CliffBriscoeREF.bDiscount == 1) ShowBarterMenu 25 else ShowBarterMenu 0 endif
Let me see what you have for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看看你都有些啥好货色。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Show me what you have for sale.
I am ready to process our transaction.
What guns do you have for sale?

if GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 >= 2 && VFreeformFreeside.NeutralBenefitExplained == 1 if GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 2 ShowBarterMenu 10 elseif GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 3 ShowBarterMenu 15 elseif GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 4 ShowBarterMenu 20 elseif GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 5 ShowBarterMenu 25 elseif GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 6 ShowBarterMenu 30 endif else ShowBarterMenu 0 endif
What do you have in stock?

if GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 >= 2 && VFreeformFreeside.NeutralBenefitExplained == 1 if GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 2 ShowBarterMenu 10 elseif GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 3 ShowBarterMenu 15 elseif GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 4 ShowBarterMenu 20 elseif GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 5 ShowBarterMenu 25 elseif GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 6 ShowBarterMenu 30 endif else ShowBarterMenu 0 endif
I'd like to see what you have for sale.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gloria Van Graff [0010C67D] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Could you repair some things for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我修复一些物品吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, let's see what you've got.
I'd like to browse your special inventory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的特别目录。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like I always say, a polite society is an armed society.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我说过的，文明社会就是武装社会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: if GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 >= 2 && VFreeformFreeside.NeutralBenefitExplained == 1 if GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 2 ShowBarterMenu 10 elseif GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 3 ShowBarterMenu 15 elseif GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 4 ShowBarterMenu 20 elseif GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 5 ShowBarterMenu 25 elseif GetReputation RepNVFreeside 0 == 6 ShowBarterMenu 30 endif else ShowBarterMenu 0 endif
Show me what you have for sale.
Our patrols are always bringing more stuff in. Take a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的巡逻队总是能带进新物资。来看看吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Short nNumCaps Set nNumCaps to VendorContainerTorresRef.GetItemCount caps001; If (nNumCaps > 7000) VendorContainerTorresRef.RemoveItem caps001 nNumCaps; VendorContainerTorresRef.AddItem caps001 7000; Endif
if GetReputationThreshold RepNVBrotherhood 1 == 2 ShowBarterMenu 15 elseif GetReputationThreshold RepNVBrotherhood 1 == 3 ShowBarterMenu 20 elseif GetReputationThreshold RepNVBrotherhood 1 == 4 ShowBarterMenu 25 elseif GetReputationThreshold RepNVBrotherhood 1 == 5 ShowBarterMenu 30 elseif GetReputationThreshold RepNVBrotherhood 1 == 6 ShowBarterMenu 35 else ShowBarterMenu 0 endif
Could I buy some spare munitions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以买一些军用部件吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. Pearl gave the green light. Take a look at the manifest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。珀尔开了绿灯。看看这货单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boomer Munitions Manager [0015D78F] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quest to Set-Up Gun Runner's Arsenal
ESP.TRADUIT: 建立起枪支走私者的军火库的任务

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your intimate knowledge of gadgets and explosives have combined to make you... the Mad Bomber! At Workbenches, you have special Explosives recipes unlocked for use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对小工具的熟悉和爆破技能结合起来，使你成为…疯狂炸弹人！在工作台上，你可以使用解锁的特别爆炸物配方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ongoing conflict in the Mojave Wasteland has kicked weapon manufacturers into high gear! All major and minor weapon dealers in the region are rolling in new weapons, ammunition types, and modifications. Head to your nearest participating vendor to peruse the merchandise!
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维持续不断的武装冲突迫使武器制造商们要来点更猛的! 所有大小武器经销商们都在不断推出新的武器, 弹药, 以及武器改造. 立刻前往距离您最近的武器供应商，检查这批新货吧!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gun Runners' Arsenal has been loaded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪支走私者的军火库已经安装.
25mm 榴弹发射器-改进型机匣

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Gun Runners' Arsenal) Increases rate of fire.

ESP.TRADUIT: 反器材步枪-碳纤维枪身
反器材步枪-枪改进型枪机

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Gun Runners' Arsenal) Increases rate of fire.

ESP.TRADUIT: 反器材狙击步枪-消音器

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Gun Runners' Arsenal) Increases rate of fire.
(Gun Runners' Arsenal) Adds usable iron sights.

ESP.TRADUIT: 激光手枪-光学聚焦系统
激光手枪-电池回收装置
等离子防御者-耐久型终端
等离子防御者-改进稳定器
等离子防御者-高能电离器
等离子手枪-粒子加速器

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Gun Runners' Arsenal) Increases speed of plasma projectile.
ESP.TRADUIT: (GRA) 提高等离子喷射体初速。
等离子手枪-电池回收装置
三连装激光步枪-光学聚焦系统
三连装激光步枪-高效电容
三连装激光步枪-耐久型终端
火焰喷射器燃料优化型

ESP.ORIGINAL: (GRA) Dyin' Ain't Much of a Living **
ESP.TRADUIT: (GRA) 死亡不是一种生活态度 **

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill members of NCR or Legion hit squads with weapons affected by the Cowboy perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用受特长“牛仔帅客”影响的武器杀死NCR游骑兵和军团刺客。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cripple Caesar's head with Throwing Spears.
Kill President Kimball with any One-Handed Pistol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用任何单手手枪杀死金博尔总统。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Super Mutants with 5.56mm Pistols, Plasma Defenders, Plasma Grenades, Power Fists, Rippers, or the Bozar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用等离子手雷，动力拳套，开膛手，等离子护卫者，无名枪，Bozar或5.56mm手枪杀死超变种人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Mojave Wasteland Mr. Gutsys and Sentry Bots with Brass Knuckles, Spiked Knuckles, Tire Irons, and Lead Pipes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用铜指虎，刺指虎,卸胎棒或铅管杀死莫哈韦废土的勇敢先生和铁卫兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Mojave Wasteland Cazadores with Tin Grenades, Long Fuse Dynamite, and Time Bombs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用锡罐手雷(GRA)、定时炸弹或黄色炸药（长引线）杀死莫哈维废土的大毒蜂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (GRA) The Same Could Be Said of All Religious Weapons *
Kill Feral Ghouls with Maria, Gehenna, and Holy Frag Grenades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用玛利亚，神圣手雷，炼狱(GRA)杀死狂尸鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Mr. House with a 9 Iron or Nephi's Golf Driver.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用九号杆或尼法的高尔夫球杆杀死豪斯先生。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill any named NCR Ranger or commissioned officer (Lieutenant, Captain, Major, Colonel, General) with Machetes, Rippers, Chainsaws, Throwing Spears, or Ballistic Fists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用砍刀、开膛手、链锯、投矛或铳枪拳套杀死任何有名字的NCR游骑兵或现役军官（中尉，上尉，少校，上校，将军）。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill any named Legion members with Hunting Revolvers, Ranger Sequoias, Brush Guns, Service Rifles, Hunting Rifles, or Cowboy Repeaters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用狩猎左轮枪、游骑兵的红杉木、灌木猎枪、军用步枪、狩猎步枪或牛仔连发枪杀死任何有名字的军团成员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cause damage with unique Mojave Wasteland weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用独有的莫哈维废土武器造成伤害。
右臂残废后使用霰弹枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (GRA) You Don't Belong In This World! *
Kill Abominations with Katanas, Dynamite, Machetes, Throwing Spears, Throwing Knives, and Throwing Hatchets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用武士刀、炸药、大刀、投矛、飞刀或投斧杀死变种野怪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Animals with any Fat Man or Fat Mines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用核弹或核子地雷杀死动物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Fiends, Vipers, or Jackals with Tire Irons, Baseball Bats, Lead Pipes, Machetes, .44 Magnum Revolvers, or Sawed-Off Shotguns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用卸胎棒、棒球棍、铅管、砍刀、.44马格南左轮枪或短管霰弹枪杀死恶魔帮，毒蛇帮或豺狼帮的匪徒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Benny with his own gun, Maria.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用班尼的“玛利亚”杀死班尼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill adult Mojave Wasteland Deathclaws with .22 Pistols, Switchblades, Boxing Tape, Recharger Rifles, or Dynamite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用.22手枪，弹簧刀，拳击布带，充能步枪，或炸药杀死莫哈韦废土中的成年死亡爪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Caesar with a Knife or Combat Knife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用小刀或战斗匕首杀死凯撒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Chairmen, White Gloves, or Omertas with any submachine gun, light machine gun, or minigun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用任何冲锋枪、轻机枪或转轮机枪杀死会长帮、黑手党或白手套成员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do damage with Gun Runners' Arsenal (GRA) Weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用GRA的武器对敌人造成伤害。
